content.rendered:
Your Boom Nice T is made from 100% Combed Ring-Spun Cotton, just like the OG T (our last drop) was.

I still have no idea what “Combed Ring-Spun Cotton” is, but what I do know is that it is an extremely comfortable, form fitting, flexible shirt that can be worn to show off those new gains while you work out or hit the town. I actually used to be sponsored by the company that we’ve now contracted to make these shirts for us, and I’ve had some of these for 2+ years and they still fit like new

Remember – the Boom Nice T is to be worn by BEASTS ONLY – no exceptions.

 

Please note that we can only ship this shirt to our American based BEASTS.

(I know..I’m from Germany, so I feel your pain, but that’s just how it is for now ;/)

excerpt.rendered:
Alright BEAST….
You absolutely blew our minds during the last shirt drop, so, by popular demand and just in time for the Holidays, it’s time for the “Boom Nice T” drop!

 – keep in mind that this shirt is to be worn by BEASTS only –

IMPORTANT NOTICE – shirts will be available until Dec 14th and will ship on Dec 21th.
